abstract: Connecticut defensive back Byron Jones sets record of 12 feet 3 inches in the broad jump at NFL scouting combine; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jones soared 12 feet 3 inches in the broad jump at the N.F.L. scouting combine. That is eight inches better than any jump in the combine database.

headline.main: UConn Player Byron Jones Shines at Combine

snippet: Jones soared 12 feet 3 inches in the broad jump at the N.F.L. scouting combine. That is eight inches better than any jump in the combine database.
